text: @TrumpWarRoom @maddow Stop the BS. Trump called COVID-19 Democrats hoax. Your LIES & gaslighting are not going to save Trump from his incompetence. Besides there is video. @chrislhayes @CillizzaCNN @SpeakerPelosi @costareports @JohnJHarwood @SenSchumer @CNN @chucktodd @thehill @politico @samstein
